Package com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory

Interface InventoryContract.ItemGroupsAndItemsColumns

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InventoryContract.ItemColumns
    Enclosing class:
    InventoryContract
    public static interface InventoryContract.ItemGroupsAndItemsColumns
extends InventoryContract.ItemColumns
    These column names are used to access fields of ItemGroup which have names identical to Item or which are computed when querying via the InventoryContract.ItemGroup.CONTENT_URI_AND_ITEMS URI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ITEM_GROUP_ITEMS_COUNT
      Item Count in Item Group.
      static String ITEM_GROUP_NAME
      Item Group Name.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryContract.ItemColumns

        ALTERNATE_NAME, AUTO_MANAGE, AVAILABLE, CODE, COLOR_CODE, COST, COUNT, DEFAULT_TAX_RATES, HIDDEN, ID, IS_REVENUE, ITEM_GROUP_UUID, MENU_DESCRIPTION, MENU_ENABLED, MENU_IMAGE_FILENAME, MENU_NAME, MENU_REASON_CODE, MODIFIED_TIME, NAME, PRICE, PRICE_TYPE, PRICE_WITHOUT_VAT, SKU, TAXABLE, UNIT_NAME, UUID
